name: Call of Duty: Black Ops II Sound Archive

description: Most Call of Duty: Black Ops II gamers will not come across a SABL file. However, gamers looking to modify sound effects in the game can alter SABL files. You can open SABL files in Black Ops II Sound Studio.
SABL files can be found in the following directory of Call of Duty: Black Ops II in Windows:
Steam/​steamapps/​common/​Call of Duty Black Ops II/​sound
